sections.text: All procedures, motions and other matters relating to the trial, by jury or otherwise, of any civil action or proceeding, trial de novo and returns on certiorari from the minor judiciary shall be conducted in the manner, at the times, on the terms and conditions and in the form prescribed by general rules.
The trial of a civil action or proceeding shall be deemed to commence and terminate at the times or on the occurrence of events prescribed by general rules.
